name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White takes on a monochromatic design, dressed in Cloud White from heel to toe, featuring adidas signature technologies, including PRIMEKNIT and Boost.

The Triple White adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA upper is made of PRIMEKNIT material, which gives it a lightweight and breathable feel. The midsole features adidas’ Boost technology, ensuring support and comfort. Underfoot, the Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally, while the Continental™ rubber outsole provides traction and grip. For brand recognition, the sneaker features the iconic 3-Stripes on the lateral and medial sides, with an adidas logo on the tongue tag. With a lace closure for a secure fit, this shoe provides both comfort and an eco-conscious design.

What stands out in the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple White is its commitment to sustainability, as its upper incorporates a high-performance yarn made from at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic, repurposed from plastic waste intercepted in remote coastal areas and shorelines, preventing ocean pollution. The remaining 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester. The shoe was released on January 1st, 2023, for $200.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black is a new colorway of the Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA line of sneakers.

The Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black features a Primeknit upper that is both flexible and breathable, allowing for a snug fit that will keep your feet comfortable and supported no matter how long your run or workout. The shoe also features a Boost midsole, which offers energy return and cushioning, making it perfect for those who need protection from the impact of running, jumping, and other high-intensity activities. The shoe's Continental rubber outsole provides traction on both wet and dry surfaces, giving you the confidence to tackle any terrain with ease.

We think that the standout feature of the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Triple Black is its sleek design. The use of black on black gives the shoe a clean and minimalist look that is both stylish and understated. The shoe was released on November 30th, 2022 at a retail price of $200.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Cloud White Core Black Iron Metallic
adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black is a striking dual-chromatic sneaker. This running and lifestyle shoe is partially made of recycled Parley Ocean Plastic, signifying the adidas commitment to the environment.

The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA in a Core Black colorway features an upper in black adidas Primeknit designed to hug your foot and provide comfort and energy-enhancing support. The black adidas three stripes on the side panel and a black Fitcounter molded heel counter have a sheen that sets them apart from the Primeknit. The tongue, laces, pull tab on the heel, sock liner, and insoles are also unrelieved black.

The feature we most enjoy about this shoe is the high-performance sole unit. Hundreds of Boost capsules are fused to cushion and return energy with every step. The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Black was released on January 1, 2023, for a retail price of $200.

name: adidas Ultra 4DFWD Core Black

details.description:
The adidas Ultra 4DFWD Core Black is a running shoe that comes in a Core Black colorway.

The upper of the Ultra 4DFWD in Core Black is made from a lightweight and breathable PRIMEKNIT material, which helps to keep your feet cool and comfortable during long runs. The shoe also features the adidas 4D midsole, which is made using a digital printing process that creates a unique lattice structure. This structure helps to absorb impact and distribute pressure evenly across the foot, reducing the risk of injury.

We think that one of the most impressive features of the adidas Ultra 4DFWD Core Black is its FWD Motion technology. This technology is designed to take your energy and forward motion to the next level, making your runs more efficient and more comfortable. The shoe's unique outsole design works in tandem with the 4D midsole to propel you forward with each stride, giving you a feeling of confidence and power as you run. The shoe was released on July 13th, 2022 at a retail price of $220.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black adds a monochromatic black look to the Ultra Boost collection.

The adidas Ultra Boost 20 features a black Continental outsole and Boost midsole. The midsole for these sneakers also features 20% more Boost, which offers more comfort, flexibility, and durability and allows the wearer to absorb and return more energy when running. The adidas Primeknit upper provides a supportive fit, while the heel is made with soft elastane material for comfort. Tailored Fiber Placement technology offers stitched-in reinforcement as well as a superior fit and lightweight feel.

The adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple Black released in December of 2019 and retailed for $180.

name: adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black is a performance shoe designed for lightness and energy return.

This iteration of the adidas Ultra Boost Light is made with a Primeknit and textile upper to make the shoe lightweight and breathable. The upper is all black and is made partially from recycled material. The adidas three stripes logo appears on each side, running from the laces to the outsole in black. The three stripes’ construction also serves to support and stabilize the shoe. The tongue sports another adidas logo, and a thick black sole and outsole provide energy return. The shoe is equipped with Boost suspension technology and the Linear Energy Push system for extra performance enhancement.

What we like most about this shoe is the combination of lightweight materials used to build it. It provides not only comfort but also functionality. The adidas Ultra Boost Light Triple Black was released on January 3, 2024, for an initial retail price of $190.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Cloud White Green

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Cloud White Green has many of the features of quality running shoes. But, this stylish shoe is also suitable for casual wear. It is made of primeknit, which gives it breathability and exceptional comfort. The Boost cushioning midsole and Torsion system are added to its support for better stability.

Its colors are cloud white and green. adidas has included its brand identity on this athletic sneaker. You'll see the iconic 3-Stripes on its sidewalls, the adidas trefoil symbol on the outer tongue, and the ultraboost name on the side heel.

The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Cloud White Green has a rubber outsole with a tread pattern, which gives you a better grip whether you're walking or running. Our team is most impressed with this primeknit upper's flexibility and stretchiness. adidas released this shoe on August 13, 2022. It originally retailed for $190.

name: adidas Ultra 4D Multi-Color

details.description:
The adidas Ultra 4D Multi-Color combines high performance running capability, high fashion, and environmental conscientiousness in one shoe.

The Multicolor adidas Ultra 4D features an upper made of at least 50% recycled material. A multicolor PrimeKnit base conforms to your foot for enhanced comfort, while white synthetic overlays on the toecap and heel and a blue synthetic overlay on the collar provide style and support. A white synthetic midfoot cage sports orange eyestays and the signature side panel three stripes in black. Ultra 4D branding at the lateral heel and neon green laces complete the look of this upper.

What we find most delightful and innovative about this sneaker is the latticework 4D midsole, which was made with a 3D printer. Providing ultimate spring and cushioning, it sits atop a black rubber outsole designed for grip and impact absorption. This sole unit also features an extended heel for increased stability with every step. The adidas Ultra 4D Multi-Color was released on March 14, 2022, for $220 retail.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 4.0 Triple Black Nubuck Cage

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 4 Triple Black arrives in a color palette, featuring a ‘Triple Black’ offering that is formed with a sock-like fit of Primeknit application on the upper.
​
​This Ultra Boost 4 by adidas features a low-top silhouette that is entirely adorned in the deep black shade. Texture contrasts are also prevalent throughout with matte-finished cage overlays and heel support systems in plastic instead of the nubuck material. The Continental rubber outsole is for traction, while the tonal full-length Boost midsole is for cushioning.
​
​The adidas Ultra Boost 4 Triple Black was released on the 3rd of December 2018, and initially sold for $180.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Legend Ink White Grey
adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Grey

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Grey is a running shoe from the adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA lineup in a gray colorway.

This Ultra Boost sneaker features a PrimeKnit upper dressed in Gray Three and Gray Five with Core Black detailing. A gray lace cage with contrasting Three stripes and a TPU heel counter with "Ultra-Boost" lettering etched on the lateral provide support to the upper. Other details include the adidas mountain logo on the tongue, gray laces, and a padded ankle collar. Underfoot, a white Boost midsole and a black rubber outsole complete the design.

  What our experts particularly love about this Ultra Boost sneaker is its classic yet versatile colorway and the combination of comfort and style it offers. Its timeless colorway and performance-oriented design contribute to its standout nature, appealing to individuals seeking a blend of style and functionality in a sneaker. The adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 DNA Gray was released on November 30th, 2022, retailing at $200.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Grey Grey Three
adidas Ultra Boost 20 Triple White

details.description:
The adidas Ultraboost 20 comes with tailored fiber placement technology that gives you more comfort. It comes with a Primeknit all-white upper that gives the shoe a sock-like feel and fit. The upper comes with a reinforced overlay that provides the shoe with additional stability and grip. A heel featuring a cushy foam and great lockdown lets your ankles and Achilles sink comfortably. It also features a durable continental black rubber covering the outsole, enhancing the shoe's grip and appearance.

The adidas Ultraboost 20 was released in June of 2019 for $180.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Core Black Cloud White (Women's)
adidas Ultra Boost 4.0 DNA Grey Three

details.description:
Since its debut, adidas Ultra Boost 40 DNA Grey Three has continued to rank higher among the adidas’ performance runners and also comes with a street-ready design. Enhanced comfort and lightweight are among the features that make it ideal for different occasions.

The shoe upper is made from recycled high-performance material together with Parley Ocean Plastic. This rests on a grey rubber sole with boost midsole inserts. It has a separated laces cage, which completes the silhouette’s retro design.

The shoe was first released on July 2, 2021, as part of the adidas’ Ultra Boost series, which debuted in 2015. At the time of its debut, it was available for $180.

name: adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Chalk White Scarlet
adidas Ultra Boost Light Core Black Cloud White
adidas Ultra Boost 1.0 Louisville
adidas Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA Multi Patern White Turbo

details.description:
The adidas Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA Multi Patern White Turbo is a one-of-a-kind colorway from the Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA.

The adidas Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA Multi Pattern White Turbo is a low-top running shoe with a Cloud White, Core Black, and Turbo color combination. The black and white patterned Primeknit upper blends recycled plastic and polyester. A white reinforced heel counter with an Almost Pink outline features "ultraboost" text branding. The Three Stripes logo is black on the quarter, doubling as support reinforcement and eye stays for bright yellow laces. The midsole with boost technology has white and black optical illusion style patterns.

Our experts think that the standout feature of this sneaker is its eye-catching design and ability to juxtapose many patterns in an aesthetically pleasing design. The adidas Ultra Boost 5.0 DNA Multi Patern White Turbo was released on February 1, 2022, for $190.
